author: thomreis
body:
This reverts the revert in #20168 to get back the L1T tau offline DQM introduced with #20043 and then adds the patch of #20157 to avoid it crashing.

This was tested with the configuration that was run at the T0 playback when the problem was first discovered. The exception does not show anymore now.
title: Fix MonitorElement exception in L1TTau offline DQM. - 92x v2
